name: AGAW Challenge - Week 3
description:
[If you want to exit game, press Escape key]

I'm new to developing games, so I'm taking up this challenge from this article I read on gamasutra, about making a game a week. This will help me with my programming skills. I'm planning to make at least one game per genre, once a week. You can join me if you wish, just comment if you want me to follow you and we can play each other's games and give honest feedback to eachother.
